title: Powerful Features for Every Fitness Journey
subtitle: Discover all the tools and features that make LiftFire the ultimate gym companion

core.title: Core Workout Tracking
core.description: Everything you need to track your workouts effectively

exerciseDatabase.title: 1000+ Exercises at Your Fingertips
exerciseDatabase.description: Access a complete database of exercises with detailed instructions, muscle group targeting, and equipment requirements. From basic movements to advanced techniques, we've got you covered.
keyPoints: Detailed exercise instructions and form tips

offlineTracking.title: Works Everywhere, Syncs Everywhere
offlineTracking.description: Train in basements, remote gyms, or anywhere with poor connectivity. LiftFire stores everything locally and syncs seamlessly when you're back online.

workoutPlans.title: Track Every Rep, Set, and Personal Record
workoutPlans.description: Log your workouts with precision using our intuitive interface. Track weights, reps, rest times, and RPE while our system automatically calculates your progress and personal records.

gamification.title: Gamification System
gamification.description: Turn your fitness journey into an engaging game

xpSystem.title: Make Fitness Addictive
xpSystem.description: Transform your workouts into an engaging game. Earn XP for every exercise, unlock achievements for milestones, and maintain streaks that adapt to your real-life schedule.
keyPoints: Flexible streak system with compensation days

friends.title: Your Gym Community, Digitized
friends.description: Connect with workout partners, share achievements, and participate in challenges. Build a supportive community that keeps you motivated and accountable.

aiTrainer.title: Your Personal AI Trainer
aiTrainer.description: Get personalized workout recommendations, plateau detection, and form analysis. Our AI learns from your progress to provide insights that help you train smarter, not just harder.
keyPoints: Form analysis using device camera (coming soon)

technical.title: Technical Excellence
technical.description: Built with modern technology for the best user experience

pwa.title: Progressive Web App
pwa.description: Install on any device, works like a native app with offline capabilities

performance.title: Lightning Fast Performance
performance.description: Optimized for speed with <2s load times and smooth animations

security.title: Privacy & Security
security.description: Your data is encrypted and stored securely with full privacy control

accessibility.title: Accessibility Compliant
accessibility.description: WCAG 2.1 AA compliant for users with disabilities

techStack.title: Built with Modern Technology
techStack.subtitle: LiftFire uses cutting-edge technology to deliver the best possible experience

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.subtitle: Exciting features we're working on for future releases
comingSoon.description: We're constantly improving LiftFire based on user feedback and the latest fitness technology trends.
